***********************************
Filename: Network.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Net;
using System.Net.Sockets;
using System.IO;


namespace Networking
{
    public class Network
    {

        private string hostname = "";
        private int port = 0;
        TcpClient client;
        TcpClient client2;
        NetworkStream ns;
        NetworkStream ns2;
        TcpListener listener;

        public Network(string h, int p)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = p;
        }

        public Network(string h)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = 4444;
        }

        public Network(int p)
        {
            this.port = p;
        }

        ~Network()
        {
           
            
                if (client != null && client.Connected)
                {
                    ns.Close();
                    client.Close();
                    Console.WriteLine("Connection 1 closed...");
                }

                if (client2 != null && client2.Connected)
                {
                    ns2.Close();
                    client2.Close();
               
                Console.WriteLine("Connection 2 closed...");
                }

            

        }



        public void Send(string message)
        {
            byte[] byteTime = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(message);
            ns.Write(byteTime, 0, byteTime.Length);
            Console.WriteLine("Message sent...\n");
            client.Close();
            ns.Close();
                
        }


        public void Connect()
        {
             client = new TcpClient(hostname, port);
             ns = client.GetStream();
            Console.WriteLine("Connected...\n");



        }

        public void Listen()
        {
            listener = new TcpListener(GetLocalIp(), port);
            listener.Start();

            while (true)
            {                
                Console.WriteLine($"Waiting for connection on {GetLocalIp()}:{port}\n");
                TcpClient client2 = listener.AcceptTcpClient();
                Console.WriteLine("Connection accepted...\n");
                NetworkStream ns2 = client2.GetStream();
                byte[] bytes = new byte[1024];
                int bytesRead = ns2.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);
                string message = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes, 0, bytesRead);
                Console.WriteLine($"{message}\n");
                StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(@"log.txt", true);
                sw.Write(message);
                sw.Flush();
                sw.Close();
                ns2.Close();
                client2.Close();

            }
            
            
        }

        public IPAddress GetLocalIp()
        {
            IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());
            IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[7];

            return ipAddress;
          
        }

        public string GetIpAddressString(string host)
        {

            try
            {
                if (host != null && host != "")
                {
                    IPHostEntry ip = Dns.GetHostEntry(host);

                    string result = Convert.ToString(ip.AddressList[0]);

                    return result;
                }
                return null;

            }
            catch
            {
                throw new NotImplementedException();
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Program.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Networking;
using System.Net;
using System.Net.Sockets;

namespace Tester
{
    class Program
    {
        public static Network n;

        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            try
            {

                
                Console.Write("Enter an IP address or hostname: ");
                string host = Console.ReadLine();
                Console.Write("Enter a port number: ");
                string p = Console.ReadLine();
                int port = 0;
                int.TryParse(p, out port);

              

                while(true)
                {
                    CreateConnection(host, port);
                    Console.Write("Enter a message to send: ");
                    string message = Console.ReadLine();
                    SendMessage(message);
                }
                
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Data);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.HelpLink);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.StackTrace);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.InnerException);
                Console.ReadLine();
            }

        }

        private static void CreateConnection(string host, int port)
        {
            n = new Network(host, port);
            n.Connect();

        }

        private static void SendMessage(string message)
        {
            n.Send(message);
        }

        static public IPAddress GetLocalIp()
        {
            IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());
            IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[0];

            return ipAddress;

        }
    }
}

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace freehand
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();

            this.Opacity = (double)70 / 100;



        }

        string fileToOpen;
        string readText;
        string fileToSave;
        string currentFile;

        string defaultFile = "Untitled.txt";
        string autoSaveFile = "AutoSave.txt";

        private Color defaultBackColor;
        private Color defaultForeColor;

        public static bool autoSaveOption = true;

        

        private int CreateNew()
        {
                
            try
            {
                File.WriteAllText(defaultFile, "");

                readText = File.ReadAllText(defaultFile);

                textBox1.Text = readText;
                
                return 1;

            }
            catch
            {
                return 0;
            } 
            


         
        }

        private void LoadSettings()
        {
            StreamReader reader;
            string line;
            string autoSaveFile = "AutoSave.txt";

            this.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            this.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;
            textBox1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            textBox1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;
            menuStrip1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            menuStrip1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;
            


            try
            {



                if (File.Exists(autoSaveFile))
                {
                    

                    reader = File.OpenText(autoSaveFile);



                    while (!reader.EndOfStream)
                    {
                        line = reader.ReadLine();

                        textBox1.Text += line + "\r\n";
                    }
                        
                    
                    reader.Close();
                }


            }
            catch(Exception ex)
            {
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }

        }


        private int Open()
        {
           
            if (File.Exists(fileToOpen))
            {
                readText = File.ReadAllText(fileToOpen);

                textBox1.Text = readText;

                currentFile = fileToOpen;

            }
            else
            {
                return 0;
            }

            return 1;
            

        }

        private int Save()
        {
            try
            {


                if (!File.Exists(currentFile))
                {
                    if (saveFile.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
                    {
                        currentFile = saveFile.FileName;
                        File.WriteAllText(currentFile, "");
                    }


                }

                if (File.Exists(currentFile))
                {
                    //get edited text from textbox1
                    readText = textBox1.Text;

                    //write it to the selected file
                    File.WriteAllText(currentFile, readText);

                }
                else
                {
                    return 0;
                }
                return 1;
            }
            catch(Exception ex)
            {
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
                return 0;
            }
        }


        private int SaveAs(string path)
        {
            try
            {


                if (!File.Exists(path))
                {
                    File.WriteAllText(path, "");
                }
                if (File.Exists(path))
                {
                    //get edited text from textbox1
                    readText = textBox1.Text;

                    //write it to the selected file
                    File.WriteAllText(path, readText);

                    currentFile = path;

                }
                else
                {
                    return 0;
                }
                return 1;
            }
            catch(Exception ex)
            {
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
                return 0;
            }
        }

        private void Exit()
        {
            try
            {


                int result;

                if(autoSaveOption == true)
                {
                    readText = textBox1.Text;

                    File.WriteAllText(autoSaveFile, readText);
                    
                    this.Close();
                }
                
                if (textBox1.Text != readText)
                {
                    DialogResult result1 = MessageBox.Show("Would you like to save the changes?",currentFile , MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel, MessageBoxIcon.Question, MessageBoxDefaultButton.Button3);

                    if (result1.ToString() == "Yes")
                    {
                        result = Save();

                        if (result == 1)
                        {
                            this.Close();
                        }
                    }

                    if (result1.ToString() == "No")
                    {
                        this.Close();
                    }
                    if (result1.ToString() == "Cancel")
                    {
                        return;
                    }


                }
                this.Close();
            }
            catch(Exception ex)
            {
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
            
        }


        private void openToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            int result;

            if (openFile.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
            {
                fileToOpen = openFile.FileName;
                
                result = Open();

            }
        }

        private void exitToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            
            Exit();
        }

        private void saveToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            Save();


        }

        private void saveAsToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            int result;
            try
            {



                if (saveFile.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
                {
                    fileToSave = saveFile.FileName;
                    result = SaveAs(fileToSave);
                }

                
            }
            catch
            {
                throw;
            }
        }

        private void newToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            int result;
            result = CreateNew();
        }

        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            CreateNew();
            LoadSettings();
        }      

        private void darkBlueToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            this.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            this.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;  
            textBox1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            textBox1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;
            menuStrip1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Black;
            menuStrip1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.LawnGreen;

        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)40/100;
        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem3_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)50 / 100;
        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem4_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)60 / 100;
        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem5_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)70 / 100;
        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem6_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)80 / 100;
        }

        private void toolStripMenuItem7_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = (double)90 / 100;
        }

        private void offToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            ActiveForm.Opacity = 1.0;
        }

        private void coolBlueToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        { 
            BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Azure;
            ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.DarkOrange;
            textBox1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Azure;
            textBox1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.DarkOrange;
            menuStrip1.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.Azure;
            menuStrip1.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.DarkOrange;

        }

        private void defaultToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            BackColor = defaultBackColor;
            ForeColor = defaultForeColor;
            textBox1.BackColor = defaultBackColor;
            textBox1.ForeColor = defaultForeColor;
            menuStrip1.BackColor = defaultBackColor;
            menuStrip1.ForeColor = defaultForeColor;
        }

        private void settingsToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            Form2 settingsForm = new Form2();

            settingsForm.Show();
        }

    }

}

        {

            {
                components.Dispose();
            }
            base.Dispose(disposing);

        }

        {
            this.Close();
        }

        {
            Form1.autoSaveOption = true;
        }

        {
            Form1.autoSaveOption = false;
        }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace freehand
{
    static class Program
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>
        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Password_Validation
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }
        //The NumberUpperCase method accepts a string argument
        //and returns the number of uppercase letters it contains.

        private int NumberUpperCase(string str)
        {
            int upperCase = 0;
            //count the uppercase characters in str.

            foreach(char ch in str)
            {
                if(char.IsUpper(ch))
                {
                    upperCase++;
                }
            }
            //return the number of uppercase characters.
            return upperCase;

        }
        //the NumberLowerCase method accepts a string argument
        //and returns the number of lowercase letters it contains

        private int NumberLowerCase(string str)
        {
            int lowerCase = 0; //the number of lowercase letters

            //count the lowercase characters in str.

            foreach (char ch in str)
            {
                if(char.IsLower(ch))
                {
                    lowerCase++;

                }
            }
            //returns the number of lowercase letters.
            return lowerCase;
        }

        //the NumberDigits method accepts a string argument and returns the number of numeric digits it contains.
        private int NumberDigits(string str)
        {
            int digits = 0; //  amount of digits

            //count the digits in the str.
            foreach (char ch in str)
            {
                if (char.IsDigit(ch))
                {
                    digits++;
                }
            }
            //return the number of digits.
            return digits;
        }

        private void checkPasswordButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            const int MIN_LENGTH = 8; // passwords minimum length
            string password = passwordTextBox.Text;

            //validate the password.

            if (password.Length >= MIN_LENGTH && NumberUpperCase(password) >= 1 && NumberLowerCase(password) >= 1 && NumberDigits(password) >= 1)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("The password is valid.");

            }
            else
            {
                MessageBox.Show("The password does not meet " + "the requirements.");
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

using System;

{
    static class Program
    {

        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>

        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }

***********************************

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace realnewsinc___article_generator_1
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

       
        string headline;
        string sourcelink;
        string quote;
        string sourcedomain;
        string indexFilename = "index.htm";
        string articleFilename = "template.htm";
        string articlename;
        List<string> articleList = new List<string>();
        List<string> indexList = new List<string>();

        private void process_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {

            headline = headlineTextBox.Text;
            sourcelink = storysourceTextBox.Text;
            quote = quoteTextBox.Text;
            sourcedomain = sourcedomainTextBox.Text;
            articlename = articleFilenameTextBox.Text + ".htm";

            WriteIndex(headline, sourcelink, quote, sourcedomain, articlename);

            WriteArticle(headline, sourcelink, quote, sourcedomain, articlename);

        }

        public void WriteIndex(string headline, string storysource, string quote, string sourcedomain, string articlename)
        {
            try
            {
                string line;                
                StreamReader indexFile;
              
                int count = 0;
                string readText = "";

                indexFilename = "indexTemplate.txt";
                indexFile = File.OpenText(indexFilename);

                

               while (!indexFile.EndOfStream) 
                    {
                    

                    line = indexFile.ReadLine();

                    indexList.Add(line);

                    
                    

                    }
                indexList[4] = articlename;
                indexList[6] = headline;
                indexList[11] = sourcelink;
                indexList[13] = sourcedomain;
                indexList[30] = quote;


                

                

                while (count != 34)
                {
                    readText += indexList[count] + "\r\n";
                    count++;
                }

                string FilePath = @"index.htm";

                var text = new StringBuilder();





                foreach (string s in File.ReadAllLines(FilePath))
                {
                    text.AppendLine(s.Replace("<div class=\"hide\"></div>", "<div class=\"hide\"></div>" + "\n\n <!-- article----------->\n\n" + readText + "\n\n <!-- article----------->"));
                }

                using (var file = new StreamWriter(File.Create(FilePath)))
                {
                    file.Write(text.ToString());

                    file.Close();

                    MessageBox.Show("index.htm updated");
                }






            }
            catch 
            {
                MessageBox.Show("Error");
            }
        }

        public void WriteArticle(string headline, string storysource, string quote, string sourcedomain, string articlename)
        {
            try
            {
                string line;
                StreamReader articleFile;

                int count = 0;
                string readText = "";

                articleFilename = "articleTemplate.txt";
                articleFile = File.OpenText(articleFilename);



                while (!articleFile.EndOfStream)
                {


                    line = articleFile.ReadLine();

                    articleList.Add(line);




                }
                articleList[2] = headline;
                articleList[6] = headline;
                articleList[44] = headline;
                articleList[46] = sourcelink;
                articleList[49] = sourcedomain;
                articleList[69] = quote;
                articleList[76] = "onclick=\"window.location ='" + sourcelink + "';\"";






                while (count != 89)
                {
                    readText += articleList[count] + "\r\n";
                    count++;
                }

                string FilePath = @"article_template.htm";

                var text = new StringBuilder();

               
                foreach (string s in File.ReadAllLines(FilePath))
                {
                    text.AppendLine(s.Replace("<div class=\"hide\"></div>", "<div class=\"hide\"></div>" + "\n\n <!-- article----------->\n\n" + readText + "\n\n <!-- article----------->"));
                }

                using (var file = new StreamWriter(File.Create(articlename)))
                {
                    file.Write(text.ToString());

                    file.Close();

                    MessageBox.Show("article created");
                }






            }
            catch
            {
                MessageBox.Show("Error");
            }
        }



        private void selectIndexToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            if (openFile.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
            {
                indexFilename = openFile.FileName;
                
            }
        }

        private void selectTemplateToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            if (openFile.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.OK)
            {
                articleFilename = openFile.FileName;
                
            }
        }

        private void exit_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            this.Close();
        }

        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {

        }

        private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            quoteTextBox.Text += " <br><br>";
        }
    }
}

using System.Reflection;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Runtime.InteropServices;

// General Information about an assembly is controlled through the following 
// set of attributes. Change these attribute values to modify the information
// associated with an assembly.
[assembly: AssemblyTitle("realnewsinc - article generator 1")]
[assembly: AssemblyDescription("")]
[assembly: AssemblyConfiguration("")]
[assembly: AssemblyCompany("")]
[assembly: AssemblyProduct("realnewsinc - article generator 1")]
[assembly: AssemblyCopyright("Copyright ©  2017")]
[assembly: AssemblyTrademark("")]

Filename: Networking.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Net;
using System.Net.Sockets;
using System.IO;
using System.Diagnostics;


namespace Networking
{
    //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // This version of the Networking class does not close the connection after each message.
    //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class Network
    {

        private string hostname = "";
        private int port = 0;
        TcpClient client;
        TcpClient client2;
        NetworkStream ns;
        NetworkStream ns2;
        TcpListener listener;

        public Network(string h, int p)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = p;
        }

        public Network(string h)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = 4444;
        }

        public Network(int p)
        {
            this.port = p;
        }

        ~Network()
        {


            if (client != null && client.Connected)
            {
                ns.Close();
                client.Close();
                Console.WriteLine("Connection 1 closed...");
            }

            if (client2 != null && client2.Connected)
            {
                ns2.Close();
                client2.Close();

                Console.WriteLine("Connection 2 closed...");
            }



        }



        public void Send(string message)
        {
            byte[] byteTime = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(message);
            ns.Write(byteTime, 0, byteTime.Length);
            Console.WriteLine("Message sent...\n");
           

        }


        public void Connect()
        {
            byte[] byteResult = new byte[10240];
            byteResult = null;
            client = new TcpClient(hostname, port);
            ns = client.GetStream();
            Console.WriteLine("Connected...\n");

            while(true)
            {
                if (byteResult != null && byteResult.Length != 0)
                {
                    ns.Write(byteResult, 0, byteResult.Length);
                    ns.Flush();
                    byteResult = null;
                }
                else
                {
                    ns.Write(new byte[1]{ 1 }, 0, 1);
                }
                
                ns = client.GetStream();
                byte[] byteCommand = new byte[10240];
                int bytesRead = ns.Read(byteCommand, 0, byteCommand.Length);
                string command = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(byteCommand, 0, bytesRead);

                string result = CommandRouter(command);
                byteResult = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(result);

            }


        }

        private string CommandRouter(string command)
        {
            string result = String.Empty;
           
            switch(command)
            {
                case "command1":
                    {
                                            

                        return null;
                    }
                case "command2":
                    {
                        
                        return null;
                    }

                 default:
                    {   
                        result = executeResult(command);

                        return result;
                    }

            }
          
        }

        private string executeResult(string command)
        {
            Console.WriteLine(command);

            Process cmd = new Process();
            cmd.StartInfo.FileName = "cmd.exe";
            cmd.StartInfo.Arguments = "/C " + command;
            cmd.StartInfo.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;
            cmd.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;
            cmd.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;
            cmd.Start();           
            string result = cmd.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();
            cmd.WaitForExit();
            Console.WriteLine(result);
           
            Console.WriteLine(cmd.ExitCode);
            return result;
        }

        public void Listen()
        {
            listener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, port);
            listener.Start();
            Console.WriteLine($"Waiting for connection on {listener.LocalEndpoint}\n");
            client2 = listener.AcceptTcpClient();
            Console.WriteLine("Connection accepted...\n");

            while (true)
            {
               
                ns2 = client2.GetStream();
                byte[] bytes = new byte[10240];
                int bytesRead = ns2.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);
                string message = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes, 0, bytesRead);
                Console.WriteLine($"{message}\n");
                byte[] command = GetCommand();
                ns2.Write(command, 0, command.Length);
              

            }


        }

        private byte[] GetCommand()
        {

            Console.WriteLine("Enter a command: ");
            string command = Console.ReadLine();
            Console.WriteLine(command);
            byte[] byteCommand = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(command);

            return byteCommand;
        }

        public IPAddress GetLocalIp()
        {
            IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());
            IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[7];

            return ipAddress;

        }

        public string GetIpAddressString(string host)
        {

            try
            {
                if (host != null && host != "")
                {
                    IPHostEntry ip = Dns.GetHostEntry(host);

                    string result = Convert.ToString(ip.AddressList[0]);

                    return result;
                }
                return null;

            }
            catch
            {
                throw new NotImplementedException();
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Program.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Networking;

namespace RemoteControl
{
    class Program
    {
        public static Network n;

        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            try
            {

                DisplayMenu();

            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Data);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.HelpLink);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.StackTrace);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.InnerException);
                Console.WriteLine("Press the Enter key to exit...");
                Console.ReadLine();
            }

        }

        private static void DisplayMenu()
        {
            Console.Write("------------------------------------------------------\n");
            Console.Write("----------------  Choose an Option  ------------------\n");
            Console.Write("-------------  1: Listener  2: Client   --------------\n");
            Console.Write("------------------------------------------------------\n");
            Console.WriteLine("");
            Console.Write(">> ");
            string choice = Console.ReadLine();
            int menuOption = 0;
            int.TryParse(choice, out menuOption);

            if (menuOption == 1 || menuOption == 2)
            {
                menuHub(menuOption);
            }
            else
            {
                Console.Clear();
                Console.WriteLine("Error: Must type 1 for listener or 2 for client!\n");
                DisplayMenu();
            }

        }

        private static void menuHub(int menuOption)
        {
            switch (menuOption)
            {
                case 1:
                    {
                        runServer();
                        break;
                    }
                case 2:
                    {
                        runClient();
                        break;
                    }
            }
        }

        private static void runServer()
        {
            Console.Write("Enter a port number: ");
            string p = Console.ReadLine();
            int port = 0;
            int.TryParse(p, out port);

            Listen(port);
        }

        private static void runClient()
        {
            Console.Write("Enter an IP address or hostname: ");
            string host = Console.ReadLine();
            Console.Write("Enter a port number: ");
            string p = Console.ReadLine();
            int port = 0;
            int.TryParse(p, out port);
            CreateConnection(host, port);


            while (true)
            {
                
                
            }
        }

        private static void Listen(int port)
        {
            n = new Network(port);
            n.Listen();
        }

        private static void CreateConnection(string host, int port)
        {
            n = new Network(host, port);
            n.Connect();

        }

        private static void SendMessage(string message)
        {
            n.Send(message);
        }


    }
}

Filename: Networking.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Net;
using System.Net.Sockets;
using System.IO;


namespace Networking
{
    //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // This version of the Networking class does not close the connection after each message
    // and create a new connection each time  a message is sent.
    //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class Network
    {

        private string hostname = "";
        private int port = 0;
        TcpClient client;
        TcpClient client2;
        NetworkStream ns;
        NetworkStream ns2;
        TcpListener listener;

        public Network(string h, int p)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = p;
        }

        public Network(string h)
        {
            this.hostname = h;
            this.port = 4444;
        }

        public Network(int p)
        {
            this.port = p;
        }

        ~Network()
        {


            if (client != null && client.Connected)
            {
                ns.Close();
                client.Close();
                Console.WriteLine("Connection 1 closed...");
            }

            if (client2 != null && client2.Connected)
            {
                ns2.Close();
                client2.Close();

                Console.WriteLine("Connection 2 closed...");
            }



        }



        public void Send(string message)
        {
            byte[] byteTime = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(message);
            ns.Write(byteTime, 0, byteTime.Length);
            Console.WriteLine("Message sent...\n");
           

        }


        public void Connect()
        {
            client = new TcpClient(hostname, port);
            ns = client.GetStream();
            Console.WriteLine("Connected...\n");



        }

        public void Listen()
        {
            listener = new TcpListener(GetLocalIp(), port);
            listener.Start();
            Console.WriteLine($"Waiting for connection on {GetLocalIp()}:{port}\n");
            client2 = listener.AcceptTcpClient();
            Console.WriteLine("Connection accepted...\n");

            while (true)
            {
               
                ns2 = client2.GetStream();
                byte[] bytes = new byte[1024];
                int bytesRead = ns2.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);
                string message = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes, 0, bytesRead);
                Console.WriteLine($"{message}\n");
                StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(@"log.txt", true);
                sw.Write(message);
                sw.Flush();
                sw.Close();
              

            }


        }

        public IPAddress GetLocalIp()
        {
            IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());
            IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[7];

            return ipAddress;

        }

        public string GetIpAddressString(string host)
        {

            try
            {
                if (host != null && host != "")
                {
                    IPHostEntry ip = Dns.GetHostEntry(host);

                    string result = Convert.ToString(ip.AddressList[0]);

                    return result;
                }
                return null;

            }
            catch
            {
                throw new NotImplementedException();
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Program.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Networking;

namespace RemoteControl
{
    class Program
    {
        public static Network n;

        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            try
            {

                DisplayMenu();

            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.Data);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.HelpLink);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.StackTrace);
                Console.WriteLine(ex.InnerException);
                Console.WriteLine("Press the Enter key to exit...");
                Console.ReadLine();
            }

        }

        private static void DisplayMenu()
        {
            Console.Write("------------------------------------------------------\n");
            Console.Write("----------------  Choose an Option  ------------------\n");
            Console.Write("-------------  1: Listener  2: Client   --------------\n");
            Console.Write("------------------------------------------------------\n");
            Console.WriteLine("");
            Console.Write(">> ");
            string choice = Console.ReadLine();
            int menuOption = 0;
            int.TryParse(choice, out menuOption);

            if (menuOption == 1 || menuOption == 2)
            {
                menuHub(menuOption);
            }
            else
            {
                Console.Clear();
                Console.WriteLine("Error: Must type 1 for listener or 2 for client!\n");
                DisplayMenu();
            }

        }

        private static void menuHub(int menuOption)
        {
            switch (menuOption)
            {
                case 1:
                    {
                        runServer();
                        break;
                    }
                case 2:
                    {
                        runClient();
                        break;
                    }
            }
        }

        private static void runServer()
        {
            Console.Write("Enter a port number: ");
            string p = Console.ReadLine();
            int port = 0;
            int.TryParse(p, out port);

            Listen(port);
        }

        private static void runClient()
        {
            Console.Write("Enter an IP address or hostname: ");
            string host = Console.ReadLine();
            Console.Write("Enter a port number: ");
            string p = Console.ReadLine();
            int port = 0;
            int.TryParse(p, out port);
            CreateConnection(host, port);


            while (true)
            {
               
                Console.Write("Enter a message to send: ");
                string message = Console.ReadLine();
                SendMessage(message);
            }
        }

        private static void Listen(int port)
        {
            n = new Network(port);
            n.Listen();
        }

        private static void CreateConnection(string host, int port)
        {
            n = new Network(host, port);
            n.Connect();

        }

        private static void SendMessage(string message)
        {
            n.Send(message);
        }


    }
}

using System;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace HelloWin
{
    public class MyForm : Form
    {
        private TextBox txtEnter;
        private Label lblDisplay;
        private Button btnOk;

        public MyForm()
        {
            this.txtEnter = new TextBox();
            this.lblDisplay = new Label();
            this.btnOk = new Button();
            this.Text = "My HelloWin App!";

            // txtEnter
            this.txtEnter.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(16, 32);
            this.txtEnter.Size = new System.Drawing.Size(264, 20);

            //lblDisplay
            this.lblDisplay.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(16, 72);
            this.lblDisplay.Size = new System.Drawing.Size(264, 128);

            //btnOk
            this.btnOk.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(88, 224);
            this.btnOk.Text = "OK";
            this.btnOk.Click += new System.EventHandler(this.btnOK_Click);

            //MyForm
            this.Controls.AddRange(new Control[]
            {
                this.txtEnter, this.lblDisplay, this.btnOk
            });
        }






        static void Main()
        {
            Application.Run(new MyForm());
        }

        private void btnOK_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
        {
            lblDisplay.Text = txtEnter.Text + "\n" + lblDisplay.Text;
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace ErrorProvider_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void calcButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Variables for hours, pay rate, and gross pay
            decimal hours, payRate, grossPay;

            // Clear any existing errors.
            ErrorProvider1.SetError(hoursTextBox, "");
            ErrorProvider1.SetError(payRateTextBox, "");

            // Get values and calculate gross pay.
            if (decimal.TryParse(hoursTextBox.Text, out hours))
            {
                if (decimal.TryParse(payRateTextBox.Text, out payRate))
                {
                    // Calculate the gross pay.
                    grossPay = hours * payRate;

                    // Display the gross pay.
                    grossPayLabel.Text = grossPay.ToString("c");
                }
                else
                {
                    // Invalid pay rate
                    ErrorProvider1.SetError(payRateTextBox, 
                        "Pay rate must be numeric.");
                }
            }
            else
            {
                // Invalid hours
                ErrorProvider1.SetError(hoursTextBox, 
                    "Hours must be numeric.");
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************

    static class Program
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>
        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }
}

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace HScrollBar_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            hScrollBar.Value = 0;
            hScrollBar.Minimum = 0;
            hScrollBar.Maximum = 100;
            hScrollBar.LargeChange = 10;
            hScrollBar.SmallChange = 1;

            // Display the scroll bar's initial value
            // in the label control.
            valueLabel.Text = hScrollBar.Value.ToString();
        }

        private void hScrollBar_Scroll(object sender, ScrollEventArgs e)
        {
            // Display the scroll bar value.
            valueLabel.Text = hScrollBar.Value.ToString();
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Selected_Text_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void calcButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Variables for hours, pay rate, and gross pay
            decimal hours, payRate, grossPay;

            // Clear any existing errors.
            ErrorProvider1.SetError(hoursTextBox, "");
            ErrorProvider1.SetError(payRateTextBox, "");

            // Get values and calculate gross pay.
            if (decimal.TryParse(hoursTextBox.Text, out hours))
            {
                if (decimal.TryParse(payRateTextBox.Text, out payRate))
                {
                    // Calculate the gross pay.
                    grossPay = hours * payRate;

                    // Display the gross pay.
                    grossPayLabel.Text = grossPay.ToString("c");
                }
                else
                {
                    // Invalid pay rate
                    ErrorProvider1.SetError(payRateTextBox,
                        "Pay rate must be numeric.");

                    // Select the invalid input.
                    payRateTextBox.Focus();
                    payRateTextBox.SelectionStart = 0;
                    payRateTextBox.SelectionLength = 
                        payRateTextBox.Text.Length;
                }
            }
            else
            {
                // Invalid hours
                ErrorProvider1.SetError(hoursTextBox,
                    "Hours must be numeric.");

                // Select the invalid input.
                hoursTextBox.Focus();
                hoursTextBox.SelectionStart = 0;
                hoursTextBox.SelectionLength = 
                    hoursTextBox.Text.Length;
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.Designer.cs
***********************************

        /// <summary>

        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {

            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace VScrollBarDemo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            vScrollBar.Value = 0;
            vScrollBar.Minimum = 0;
            vScrollBar.Maximum = 100;
            vScrollBar.LargeChange = 10;
            vScrollBar.SmallChange = 1;

            // Display the scroll bar's initial value
            // in the label control.
            valueLabel.Text = vScrollBar.Value.ToString();
        }

        private void vScrollBar_Scroll(object sender, ScrollEventArgs e)
        {
            // Display the scroll bar value.
            valueLabel.Text = vScrollBar.Value.ToString();
        }
    }
}

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace WebBrowser_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void goButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                WebBrowser1.Url = new Uri(urlTextBox.Text);
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Error message for an invalid Web address.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Wage_Calculator
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void calcGrossPayButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Variables
            int hours;
            double payRate, grossPay;

            // Get data entered by the user.
            hours = int.Parse(hoursTextBox.Text);
            payRate = double.Parse(payRateTextBox.Text);

            // Calculate the gross pay.
            grossPay = hours * payRate;

            // Display the gross pay in a message box.
            MessageBox.Show("The gross pay is " + grossPay.ToString("c"));
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

***********************************

***********************************

        {

            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }

using System.Data;

using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Multiple_Buttons
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void firstButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            MessageBox.Show("You clicked the first button.");
        }

        private void secondButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            MessageBox.Show("You clicked the second button.");
        }

        private void thirdButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            MessageBox.Show("You clicked the third button.");
        }
    }
}

{
    static class Program
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>
        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Field_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        // Declare a private field to hold a name.
        private string name = "Charles";

        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void showNameButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            MessageBox.Show(name);
        }

        private void chrisButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            name = "Chris";
        }

        private void carmenButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            name = "Carmen";
        }
    }
}

Filename: Program.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Field_Demo
{
    static class Program
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>
        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace String_Variable_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void showNameButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Declare a string variable to hold the full name.
            string fullName;

            // Combine the names, with a space between them. Assign the
            // result to the fullName variable.
            fullName = firstNameTextBox.Text + " " + lastNameTextBox.Text;

            // Display the fullName variable in the fullNameLabel control.
            fullNameLabel.Text = fullName;
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>

        {

            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace TextBox_Demo
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void readInputButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Assign the name entered by the user to the
            // outputLabel control's Text property.
            outputLabel.Text = nameTextBox.Text;
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

{
    static class Program
    {

        /// The main entry point for the application.
        /// </summary>
        [STAThread]
        static void Main()
        {
            Application.EnableVisualStyles();
            Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
            Application.Run(new Form1());
        }
    }

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Add_Two_Numbers
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void addButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Local variables
            int first, second, sum;

            if (int.TryParse(firstTextBox.Text, out first))
            {
                if (int.TryParse(secondTextBox.Text, out second))
                {
                    // Add the two numbers and display the sum.
                    sum = first + second;
                    MessageBox.Show(sum.ToString());
                }
                else
                {
                    // Display an error message about the second TextBox.
                    MessageBox.Show("The second TextBox contains invalid data.");
                }
            }
            else
            {
                // Display an error message about the first TextBox.
                MessageBox.Show("The first TextBox contains invalid data.");
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace CheckBox
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void okButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            if (pepperoniCheckBox.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Pepperoni.");
            }

            if (cheeseCheckBox.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Cheese.");
            }

            if (anchoviesCheckBox.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Anchovies.");
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Grader
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void determineGradeButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // Variable to hold the test score.
                double testScore;

                // Get the test score.
                testScore = double.Parse(testScoreTextBox.Text);

                // Determine the grade.
                if (testScore < 60)
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "F";
                }
                else
                {
                    if (testScore < 70)
                    {
                        gradeLabel.Text = "D";
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        if (testScore < 80)
                        {
                            gradeLabel.Text = "C";
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            if (testScore < 90)
                            {
                                gradeLabel.Text = "B";
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                gradeLabel.Text = "A";
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Grader2
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void determineGradeButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // Variable to hold the test score.
                double testScore;

                // Get the test score.
                testScore = double.Parse(testScoreTextBox.Text);

                // Determine the grade.
                if (testScore < 60)
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "F";
                }
                else if (testScore < 70)
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "D";
                }
                else if (testScore < 80)
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "C";
                }
                else if (testScore < 90)
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "B";
                }
                else
                {
                    gradeLabel.Text = "A";
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

***********************************

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace RadioButton
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void okButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            if (footballRadioButton.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Football.");
            }
            else if (basketballRadioButton.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Basketball.");
            }
            else if (baseballRadioButton.Checked)
            {
                MessageBox.Show("You selected Baseball.");
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Range_Checker
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void checkButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // Declare a variable and initialize it with
                // the user's input.
                int number = int.Parse(inputTextBox.Text);

                // Check the number's range.
                if (number >= 1 && number <= 10)
                {
                    MessageBox.Show("That number is acceptable.");
                }
                else
                {
                    MessageBox.Show("That number is NOT acceptable.");
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Secret_Word
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void checkButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Declare a string variable and initialize it with
            // the user's input.
            string secretWord = inputTextBox.Text;

            // Did the user enter the correct secret word?
            if (secretWord == "Ariel")
            {
                MessageBox.Show("That is the correct secret word.");
            }
            else
            {
                MessageBox.Show("Sorry, that is NOT the secret word.");
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.Designer.cs
***********************************
namespace Secret_Word
{
    partial class Form1
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// Required designer variable.
        /// </summary>
        private System.ComponentModel.IContainer components = null;

        /// <summary>
        /// Clean up any resources being used.
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="disposing">true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.</param>
        protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)
        {
            if (disposing && (components != null))
            {

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Switch_Example
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void okButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            int number;

            // Get the number.
            if (int.TryParse(numberTextBox.Text, out number))
            {
                // Display the day.
                switch (number)
                {
                    case 1:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Sunday";
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Monday";
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Tuesday";
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Wednesday";
                        break;
                    case 5:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Thursday";
                        break;
                    case 6:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Friday";
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        dayOfWeekLabel.Text = "Saturday";
                        break;
                    default:
                        MessageBox.Show("Invalid number.");
                        break;
                }
            }
            else
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show("Enter an integer please.");
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

            get
            {
                return defaultInstance;
            }
        }

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace Load_Event
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // declare a variable to hold a country name
                string countryName;

                //declare a StreamReader variable.
                StreamReader inputFile;

                // open the file and get a StreamReader object.

                inputFile = File.OpenText("Countries.txt");

                //read the files contents
                while (!inputFile.EndOfStream)
                {
                    //get a country name
                    countryName = inputFile.ReadLine();

                    //add the country name to the listbox
                    countriesListBox.Items.Add(countryName);
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {

                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace Number_File
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void writeNumbersButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // Declare a StreamWriter variable.
                StreamWriter outputFile;

                // Create a file and get a StreamWriter object.
                outputFile = File.CreateText("Numbers.txt");

                // Write the numbers 1 through 10 to the file.
                for (int count = 1; count <= 10; count++)
                {
                    outputFile.WriteLine(count);
                }

                // Close the file.
                outputFile.Close();
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

        }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Number_List_Box
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void addButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            numberListBox.Items.Add(10);
            numberListBox.Items.Add(20);
            numberListBox.Items.Add(30);
            numberListBox.Items.Add(40);
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace Numeric_Data
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void readValuesButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // Variables to hold the numbers read from the file
                // and their total
                int number1, number2, number3, total;

                // A StreamReader variable.
                StreamReader inputFile;

                // Open the file and get a StreamReader object.
                inputFile = File.OpenText("NumericData.txt");

                // Read three numbers from the file.
                number1 = int.Parse(inputFile.ReadLine());
                number2 = int.Parse(inputFile.ReadLine());
                number3 = int.Parse(inputFile.ReadLine());

                // Calculate the total of the numbers.
                total = number1 + number2 + number3;

                // Display the total.
                MessageBox.Show("The total is " + total);

                // Close the file.
                inputFile.Close();
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }

        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}

using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;

namespace Speed_Converter
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;

namespace Squares
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void goButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Constant for the maximum number
            const int MAX_VALUE = 10;

            // Loop counter
            int number;

            // Display the list of numbers and their squares.
            for (number = 1; number <= MAX_VALUE; number++)
            {
                outputListBox.Items.Add("The square of " +
                    number + " is " + (number * number));
            }
        }
    }
}

***********************************
Filename: Form1.cs
***********************************
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Drawing;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using System.IO;

namespace Student_Names
{
    public partial class Form1 : Form
    {
        public Form1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private void displayNamesButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            try
            {
                // A variable to hold an item read from the file
                string studentName;

                // A StreamReader variable.
                StreamReader inputFile;

                // Open the file and get a StreamReader object.
                inputFile = File.OpenText("Students.txt");

                // Read and display the first name.
                studentName = inputFile.ReadLine();
                MessageBox.Show(studentName);

                // Read and display the second name.
                studentName = inputFile.ReadLine();
                MessageBox.Show(studentName);

                // Read and display the third name.
                studentName = inputFile.ReadLine();
                MessageBox.Show(studentName);

                // Read and display the fourth name.
                studentName = inputFile.ReadLine();
                MessageBox.Show(studentName);

                // Close the file.
                inputFile.Close();
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                // Display an error message.
                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);
            }
        }

        private void exitButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
        {
            // Close the form.
            this.Close();
        }
    }
}
